data.title: Bioanalytical Instruments
data.meta_description: Bioanalytical Instruments is a Puerto Rican company, registered under the Department of State of Puerto Rico. It was founded in December 1, 1989 by its President/General Manager, Robert Gregory. Mr. Gregory developed a technical career with Beckman Instruments/Caribbean Office for 13 years prior to founding Bioanalytical. He started as a Field Service Representative, then was appointed as Field Service Manager and finally promoted to General Manager. Bioanalytical has grown to become one of the leading companies in the analytical and scientific sales and service market in Puerto Rico and the Caribbean Islands. It is known to be “The Specialization Center of analytical and scientific instruments”. Bioanalytical Dominicana, is a dominican company, registered under The Ministry of Finance, General Direction of Internal taxes, National Registry of Contributors. Founded on December 1, 2014 by its President/General Manager, Robert Gregory. After more than 20 years servicing the analytical and scientific market in the Dominican Republic from our facilities in Puerto Rico, it became necessary to open a local office in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, due to the large base of installed Instruments at local laboratories. And also to comply with our Mission to provide Customer Satisfaction at all levels. We currently count with a full staff of trained and certified Sales Representatives and Technical Services Representatives.
data.text:
Refractometer Models by Rudolph Research Analytical

Select a Refractometer for your demanding Laboratory application from the wide range of instruments available from Rudolph Research. Rudolph is a leading analytical laboratory instrument supplier, manufacturing precision quality benchtop instruments for the Pharmaceutical, Chemical, Petroleum, Petro-Chemical, Food, and Beverage industries. All our instruments are designed to meet specific application requirements of specific industries and all are designed to exceed your requirements.

Bioanalytical Instruments is a sales and service representative for Rudolph Refractometers in Puerto Rico and the Caribbean area.
